documentation.author: Steve Wade
documentation.purpose: The purpose of this rule is to place an EKG 12 Lead order with one of two order sentences. When one of the two clinical events for EKG 12 Lead is placed the rule evokes and will fire for Inpatient and Observation unless there is an existing EKG 12 Lead order in ordered status.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement: eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go /* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_SENTENCE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Set details for orders setup by GROUP_NAME using ORDER_SENTENCE
templateDefinitions.description: Use order sentence to set order detail values

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only
Order Sentence for EKG 12 Lead -> Stat, Reason: Chest Pain, Once
Order Sentence for EKG 12 Lead -> Urgent, Reason:Chest Pain, Once
